statements: SELECT * FROM location_data WHERE id = 1;
SELECT latitude, longitude FROM location_data WHERE id > 5 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT id, timestamp FROM location_data WHERE longitude < 0 ORDER BY id;
SELECT latitude, longitude, timestamp FROM location_data WHERE latitude >= 40 AND longitude <= -70;
SELECT id, latitude FROM location_data WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2023-01-01' AND '2023-12-31' ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT * FROM location_data WHERE latitude > 40.0 AND longitude < -70.0 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT id, latitude, longitude FROM location_data WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31' ORDER BY longitude ASC, latitude DESC;
SELECT * FROM location_data WHERE timestamp > NOW() - INTERVAL 1 DAY AND id IN (1, 2, 3, 4, 5) ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT AVG(latitude) AS avg_lat, AVG(longitude) AS avg_lon FROM location_data WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT id, latitude, longitude, timestamp FROM location_data WHERE latitude IS NOT NULL AND longitude IS NOT NULL ORDER BY id ASC, timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM locations;
SELECT location_id, latitude, longitude FROM locations WHERE location_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT user_id, email FROM users WHERE location_id = 10;
SELECT username, email FROM users ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT location_id, latitude, longitude, address FROM locations WHERE location_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM locations WHERE latitude < 0;
SELECT user_id, username, email, address FROM users JOIN locations ON users.location_id = locations.location_id;
SELECT * FROM users ORDER BY username DESC, user_id ASC;
SELECT user_id, username, email, latitude, longitude FROM users JOIN locations ON users.location_id = locations.location_id WHERE latitude > 0;
SELECT * FROM locations;
SELECT name, latitude, longitude FROM locations ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT user_id, email FROM users WHERE phone_number LIKE '%123%';
SELECT check_in_id, check_in_date FROM check_ins WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM users WHERE first_name = 'John' OR last_name = 'Doe';
SELECT * FROM locations;
SELECT id, name FROM locations WHERE latitude > 40.5;
SELECT user_id, first_name, last_name, email FROM users WHERE phone_number LIKE '%1234%';
SELECT check_in_id, check_in_date FROM check_ins ORDER BY check_in_date DESC;

SELECT users.first_name, users.last_name, locations.name FROM users INNER JOIN check_ins ON users.user_id = check_ins.user_id INNER JOIN locations ON check_ins.location_id = locations.id WHERE locations.latitude < 40.7;
SELECT * FROM location_data;
SELECT id, latitude, longitude FROM user_locations WHERE user_id = 100;
SELECT name, latitude, longitude FROM places ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT email, username FROM users WHERE id = 10;
SELECT * FROM location_data WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT user_id, latitude, longitude, timestamp FROM user_locations WHERE latitude > 40 AND longitude < -70;
SELECT place_id, name FROM places ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT AVG(latitude), AVG(longitude) FROM user_locations WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01' GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT id, email FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'j%';
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE location_geocode = '12345';
SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude FROM locations ORDER BY location_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, location_id, checkin_time FROM check_ins WHERE location_id = 5 AND user_id = 10;
SELECT user_id, location_id, rating, comment FROM reviews WHERE user_id = 1 ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE last_login IS NOT NULL;
SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude FROM locations WHERE latitude > 50;
SELECT user_id, location_id, checkin_time FROM check_ins ORDER BY checkin_time DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT user_id, location_id, rating, comment FROM reviews WHERE rating >= 4 AND (comment IS NOT NULL OR comment <> '');
